name: Little Square (XTOPY)
description:
This is a game about a little square killing enemys

The main mechanic of this game is : You have 100 jumps,You can use your jumps to jump or Buy guns or strength etc:- 

This game was created for  BlackThornPord GameJam

If there is any problem with the game just comment down
